amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate regarding the need for a comprehensive, coordinated, and integrated national ocean policy.

vote.text: Amendment SA 259 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 259 proposed by Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S2935-2936; text: CR S2935-2936) To express the sense of the Senate regarding the need for a comprehensive, coordinated, and integrated national ocean policy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 259 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 259 proposed by Senator Boxer.
